metadata.title: CVE-2020-7729 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The package grunt before 1.3.0 are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Execution due to the default usage of the function load() instead of its secure replacement safeLoad() of the package js-yaml inside grunt.file.readYAML.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-7729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

grunt - 1.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grunt package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-1').
